title: It's Easier to Fall for a Bank Fraud Scam Than You Think

title: CEO of $5.6 billion Swiss bank says country is still the ‘No. 1 location’ for wealth after voters reject a tax on the ultrarich
description: In Switzerland, the top 300 wealthiest residents are worth over $1 trillion. And one banking boss says he remains “bullish” about it remaining a top destination for the world’s wealthiest.
